docs.title: Django Templates Cythonized
docs.text: Cython-accelerated Django template engine -- an exploratory package.

docs.title: What is this?
docs.text: This package takes Django's template engine source code, compiles it with Cython for speed, and incrementally optimizes with type annotations and C-level code.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
TEMPLATES = [
    {
        "BACKEND": "django_templates_cythonized.backend.CythonizedTemplates",
        "DIRS": [...],
        "APP_DIRS": True,
        "OPTIONS": {...},
    }
]

See Installation for full setup instructions.

docs.title: Status
docs.text: This is an alpha/exploratory package. It is not production-ready.

docs.title: Attribution
docs.text:
• Django's template engine source code (BSD-3-Clause)
  • Benchmark structure inspired by django-rusty-templates

docs.title: Install
docs.text:
pip install django-templates-cythonized

Or with uv:

uv add django-templates-cythonized

docs.title: Development Setup
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/oliverhaas/django-templates-cythonized.git
cd django-templates-cythonized
uv sync --group dev
uv pip install -e .  # Build Cython extensions
uv run pytest        # Run tests

docs.title: 0.1.0a1 (Unreleased)
docs.text:
• Initial alpha release
  • Copy of Django 5.2's template engine compiled with Cython
  • Drop-in CythonizedTemplates backend
